articles.title: Russia violating international law by not allowing consular access to WSJ reporter -U.S. State Dept - Reuters
articles.description: Russia has not granted U.S. consular officials access to Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich since he was detained late last month and is in violation of inte…
articles.content: WASHINGTON, April 10 (Reuters) - Russia has not granted U.S. consular officials access to Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich since he was detained late last month and is in violation of in… [+1307 chars]
